channel.title: Projects on Ethan Madison
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Ethan Madison

item.title: Project Index
item.description:
Current

  • This site: I’m still working on adding content to this site and developing its theme.
  • pia-tools: A tool for more easily using Private Internet Access VPN services on SystemD+Linux systems (especially Arch Linux). I’ve taken over maintainership of the project (first package I’ve put on the AUR!).
  • iHW-Android: A schedule app for Harvard-Westlake. I’m the 2014-15 developer and am almost finished with my AppCompat redesign.

Past

  • openpad (Fall/Winter 2014): A platform for using Andoid & iOS devices as input devices on C++-capable devices. Built with @jameslennon321 & @TheSafo.
  • LivingPlanet (December 2014): My submission to and a finalist in the 2014 Koding Global Hackathon. A Meteor site built demonstrating issues on our planet. Built with @paralin, @jameslennon321, @TheSafo, & @dwoldenberg1 (GitHub usernames).
  • HW Java networking projects: ChatServer, HTTPServer (Fall 2014)
  • En Garde (Summer 2014): An Android fencing scorekeeper built to be fast, pretty, and functional.
  • HyperTyper (Spring 2014): A typing “aid” (it’s a tool to cheat in games like TypeRacer).
  • Coo: A Minecraft escape map I built with my brother Tommy some years ago.
  • Anything else on my GitHub

Current as of 2015-08-27.
